text: Kuffaar kehtay hain hum per qayamat nahi aaye gi. Aap keh dijiyey! Kay mujhay meray rab ki qasam! Jo aalim-ul-ghaib hai kay woh yaqeenan tum per aaye gi Allah Taalaa say aik zarray kay barabar ki cheez bhi posheedah nahi na aasmano mein aur na zamin mein bulkay iss say bhi choti aur bari her cheez khuli kitab mein mojood hai
